software_developer.title: Software Developer
software_developer.job_description: As a Software Developer at PECO Software, you will develop and maintain core components in our digital product portfolio...
tasks: Develop new features in PECO’s web and backend applications
Participate in design and architecture work
Code review and sparring (collaboration) with the team
Contribute to improvements of build and deploy pipelines
technical_skills: Strong skills in Java, Python, or C#
Experience with REST APIs and microservices
Understanding of database structures (SQL and/or NoSQL)
Experience with version control (Git) and CI/CD
personal_skills: Open to feedback and continuous learning

web_developer.title: Web Developer
web_developer.job_description: As a Web Developer at PECO Software, you will be responsible for developing and maintaining our frontend solutions...
tasks: Develop and maintain user-friendly web applications
Implement UI components based on design mockups
Collaborate with UX designers and backend developers
Test and debug across browsers and devices
technical_skills: Experience with React, Vue, or Angular
Proficiency in HTML5, CSS3, and modern JavaScript (ES6+)
Knowledge of Webpack, Vite, or similar build tools
Basic understanding of SEO and WCAG
personal_skills: Focus on detail and user experience
Good at collaborating and receiving feedback
Ability to work in a fast-paced and dynamic environment

systems_administrator.title: Systems Administrator
systems_administrator.job_description: As a Systems Administrator at PECO Software, you are responsible for ensuring stable operation and security of our IT infrastructure...
tasks: Monitor and maintain servers and networks
Manage user access and security policies
Backup, recovery, and disaster recovery planning
Automation of routine tasks via scripts
technical_skills: Experience with Windows and Linux servers
Scripting in PowerShell, Bash, or similar
personal_skills: Ability to work proactively and solution-oriented
